c.x: The Tribe desires to expedite the development of the Tribe's economy to imp
Tribal creation and operation of Consumer Financial Services businesses is
The Tribe has the legal authority to license and regulate Consumer Financia

It is essential that the Governing Board regulate Consumer Financial Servic
It is essential that public confidence in Consumer Financial Services that
Adoption of this Code by the Governing Board is a necessary precondition fo
Establishment of a Consumer Financial Services Regulatory Authority ("Autho
Findings. The Governing Board of the Tribe finds that:
Diversify and expedite the development of the Tribe's economy for the purpo
Define the general regulatory powers to be exercised by the Authority in re
Ensure that all net revenue generated by Consumer Financial Services is use
Ensure that Consumer Financial Services are conducted appropriately by Lice
Protect the interests of the public in the offering of Consumer Financial S
Ensure the maintenance of public confidence in Consumer Financial Services
Ensure that there is a Tribal government forum for the fair and orderly res
Ensure that Consumer Financial Services laws and regulations are enforced.
